description:
Maya and Ami had a fight.  The two of them are avoiding each other at school, looking away whenever they meet.  After school, Maya and Fumiaki go to the pasture to look into the cattle mutilations,  where they find that all the cows have been drained of blood.  Later Maya is called by Ami to the grounds of Minakami shrine.  Just as the two are about to speak, they hear Kozue scream!
Source: crunchyroll
